prompts: Show me the 3 most recent open incidents, then for the first one: Add the note 'Investigating root cause', add responders 'John Smith' and 'Ops Team' with the message 'Need assistance ASAP', acknowledge and assign it to 'Jane Doe', and show its details, related incidents, past incidents, and outlier information.

List all teams and their members. Then, for the first team: add user 'Jane Doe' as a manager, remove user 'John Smith', update the team description to 'Handles all QA-related incidents', and delete the team. Also, list all users and show which teams they belong to.

List all services and their escalation policies. Then, for the first service: update its description to 'Handles all mobile app alerts' and show its details and escalation policy. Create a new service called 'Mobile App' with escalation policy 'Primary On-Call'.

List all schedules and who is currently on call. For the first schedule: show the users in the schedule, create a schedule override for user 'Jane Doe' from Nov 20, 2025, 9am to Nov 21, 2025, 9am, and show the schedule details.

List all status pages and their current incidents. For the first status page: create a new incident post titled 'API Outage', add an update 'We are investigating the issue', show all updates for the post, show all severities and statuses available, and show the details for the post.

List all event orchestrations and show the router rules for the first one. Then: append a router rule to route events with 'severity: critical' to the 'API Service', update the router configuration, and show the global and service orchestration configs for the 'API Service'. List all alert grouping settings and show the details for the first one. Then: create a new alert grouping setting for the 'API Service' using intelligent grouping, update the first alert grouping setting to use time-based grouping, and delete the first alert grouping setting.
List all incident workflows and show the steps for the first one. Then, start the 'Major Incident' workflow for incident #12345.
